Name: YamYam
Review Text: Truly a gem. Excellent starters and top notch wood fire pizzas. Service was professional and attentive. Recommend making reservations as seating is very limited in the evening. Call ahead.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Nothing special and did not listen when I said no blue cheese.. I left got pizza home only to be able to eat one third of it as I hate with a real passion blue cheese... dough was ok not great all round! Would try once more In case I got unlucky but not sure I did

Name: YamYam
Review Text:
Best Pizza out of Italy.
Great experience friendly staff nice Spritz.
Will return for the Osso-bucco

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Vegetarian pizza was different than in other places, as it had more mushrooms. This changed the taste and I really liked it. I definitely recommend this place.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: I've been to a few cities in Europe now and I've gotta tell you: this is the most delicious food I've had in my life. The Yam Yam pizza is fantastic!

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Truly excellent pizza! I tried one with ham and truffle and it was delicious, and one of the best pizzas I have even eaten. I continued with a pasta special, which was penne with lamb, and it was also faultless. Deserts were top notch. ‚Ä¶

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Just renovated, and food is still the best. Highly recomends.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: As Italian I got to say this place is amazing! They are not Italians originally but they learned very well how to make pizzas and warm dishes. They have an amazing wooden oven which makes the pizza taste great. Service is fast and the ‚Ä¶

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Pizza and pasta well worth the visit - however, we thought the pasta was better than the pizza, and all was priced reasonably. Staff were welcoming, patient and polite with us. Definitely recommend making a reservation, as it gets quite busy. The fettuccine was the highlight of our food explorations in Amsterdam.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: For us the best place for a tasty pizza with high quality italian's topping. You have to wait to get your pizza but you are rewarded at the first bite. Our last time was more than one year and the taste is still so great. The staff is great too. Booking is advised as the place is always crowded.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: One of the only two good pizzerias in the whole Amsterdam. Pizza really sucks in this town. Pitty they don't open earlier cos pizza is a snack, something you wanna grab and go and not really for an evening meal with candles and vine. It should be on the table, served, in three minutes, not four or more.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: YamYam could rightfully claim the householdname that it is and has been for me and my family for the last 15+ years: consistent menu, super pizzas (try YamYam & Vesuvio!) and the nicest people you can find. Yesterday the owner made a personal delivery for our pizzas because of our quarantaine. We Love It!

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Perfect pizza every time.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Very good and delicious Pizza. Try the one with the mascarpone

Name: YamYam
Review Text: The YamYam-pizza was better, years ago.. Today, their pizza's are closer too average. The dough is ok, but being baked too dry. On an average Margherita Pizza, they serve plain Dutch cheese, no Mozzarella. The wine is between average and ‚Ä¶

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Great pizza, very welcoming staff. They made us vegan pizzas, very nice. I like the place.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Reasonable food but lousy service - we had to wait for over 1 h to get our food while tables around us who came in much later were quickly seviced - they even forgot my wife‚Äôs plate - no excuses - the manager did not even pay attention

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Enjoyed our dinner.  Did not find staff unfriendly, in fact the server made the evening better ( suggested a great manly drink).  Our pasta meal was one of the best every had.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Great italian spot in Amsterdam ! It's quite far from the center but easy to do by walk. I ate an incredible osso bucco : the sauce was delicious and you can choose different types of accompagnements. My friends took some pizzas which were really big and delicious as well. Correct prices and very nice staff!

Name: YamYam
Review Text: The yamyam pizza is one of the best pizzas I've ever tried. The mascarpone cheese gives such a nice taste. Only one thing to improve: usually takes too long - also for take away.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: The pizzas are good, but doesn't worth  the bad service, we wait more than hour an a half  (and after we claim it) for our pizzas, no apologise from the staff. ‚Ä¶

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Delicious pizza! Would definitely recommend. Casual but cozy interior, service is quite decent.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: This used to be our go-to-neighborhood pizza place! Unfortunately we moved away from this area. Very tasty pizzas. We alway ordered the one with truffle.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: One of the best pizzas of the city! But expensive though. But worth the money. Nice wines as well. Make a reservation!

Name: YamYam
Review Text:
Those who didn't try their signature pizza, YamYam are missing out big time!..

Friendly staff, cozy atmosphere and always quality food & wine!

Name: YamYam
Review Text: The pizzas are very tasty, the place is cosy and the personnel is nice. Go to have one of the best pizzas in West!

Name: YamYam
Review Text: errible service and extremely rude people. Food not even that great, not worth your time. We tried to make a reservation on their online system that was in Dutch. We thought the reservation was made but there was an additional step but ‚Ä¶

Name: YamYam
Review Text: This is definitely the best pizza i ever tried. The wine was perfect, same with tiramisu. For me, this small restaurant is just - perfect.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Best pizza in town! Friendly staff, fair prices and high quality food. Highly recommended!

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Very nice pasta and wood oven baked pizza. Fresh food. Great place to go.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Absolutely amazing pizzas. I don't know about the other dishes, but their pizza is probably the best I've had!

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Love yam yam, the place feel familial and welcoming ! IT is better to reserve in advance ! And also don't go there if you have  cat allergies :)

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Super pizza, authentic Italian, honestly this place is worth way better than the average google rating

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Amazing food and really nice place. Best pizza!

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Super tasty pizzas and wine üçï but get easily crowded so a reservation is almost mandatory. Delivery can be an option if you live nearby.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Pizza is good, prices are high. Service is pretty bad and the place is rather children-unfriendly.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Pizza was nice and tasty. Could be busy so a call upfront I would like to suggest

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Really nice place to have a homemade pizza. Cooked perfectly and the Yam Yam pizza was the best

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Was a great evening! Very nice cosy atmosphere and really good food! Great to have this in the neighborhood

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Great pizza but the service is sooooo slooooow, like anywhere in Amsterdam, which is the reason for 3*

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Ok place. Liked the light bulb's shadow on the wall. Pizza a bit overpriced

Name: YamYam
Review Text:

Review Text: Excellent pizza and pasta. Charming location. Great staff.

Review Text: Very nice atmosphere, good service and most of all, great food!

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Great Pizza great service, their wifi should improve though

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Fabulous pizza's and other Italian dishes in a bright and sober setting.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Great atmosphere, friendly staff and our pizzas rocked!

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Cozy pizza joint with great food. I love the "volcana", which is spicy and delicious.

Name: YamYam
Review Text: Start a crowdfunding to re-open and I will contribute!

Review Text: Really good food for a fair price. Service is not great but that's (unfortunately) the standard in Amsterdam

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious pizzas. I've been coming here for a while and will continue to do so. Staff are also super friendly. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Best pizzeria in Amsterdam, cozy, small-scale. Plastic seats could be slightly better but you come here for the pure Italian food, fantastic! ‚Ä¶

Name: YamYam
Review Text: (Translated by Google) I come here for years at least once a month. I also go to Milan every month and visit the best pizzerias and trattorias there. But nowhere else in the world have I eaten such tasty pizzas and pastas as in YamYam - not ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) The lousy pizza! It seems frozen. I do not understand how people can say it's one of the best in Amsterdam, it looks like cardboard, it's not Italian pizza for mana! ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious freshly prepared real Italian pizza from the brick oven. My favorite, a vegi with tuna on it. The tiramisu is also recommended. ‚Ä¶
